remarks: Define the set of complex Hilbert-space-valued states on a Hilbert lattice.  Definition of CH-states in [Mayet3] p. 9.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jun-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-hst $p |- CHStates = { f e. ( ~H ^m CH ) | ( ( normh ` ( f ` ~H ) ) = 1 /\ A. x e. CH A. y e. CH ( x C_ ( _|_ ` y ) -> ( ( ( f ` x ) .ih ( f ` y ) ) = 0 /\ ( f ` ( x vH y ) ) = ( ( f ` x ) +h ( f ` y ) ) ) ) ) } $.
$d f x y $.
